name: COVID-19 Office Questionnaire
instructions: Use this as a checklist for people who want to visit the premises when a contagious disease is going around. Any "yes" answer may require additional information and/or a delayed visit.

items.text: In the last 72 hours, have you or anyone in your household experienced:  Fever, coughing, sore throat, difficult breathing, shortness of breath, muscle aches, vomiting or diarrhea, loss of sense of taste or smell, fatigue, or feeling unwell?
In the past 14 days:  Have you or anyone in your household had contact with any person suspected to have contracted COVID-19?
Have you or anyone in your household been advised to self-quarantine because of exposure to someone with COVID-19?
Have you been tested for COVID-19?  If yes, when and what were results?
Have you been diagnosed with COVID-19?  If yes, when?
